body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       The mission of Manassas National Battlefield Park is to preserve the historic landscape containing historic sites, buildings, objects and views that contribute to the national significance of the First and Second Battles of Manassas, for the use, inspiration and benefit of the public.         Superintendent's Compendium Unmanned Aircraft Policy          GMP: Environmental Impact Statement  http://parkplanning.nps.gov/projectHome.cfm?parkId=191&projectId=13340      Link to: White-tailed Deer Management Plan Environmental Impact Statement      Link to: Special Use Permit Application
title: Manassas National Battlefield Park: Management
